headline: L3Harris Technologies price target raised to $270 from $240 at TD Cowen
summary: TD Cowen analyst Gautam Khanna raised the firm’s price target on L3Harris Technologies (LHX) to $270 from $240 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm updated its model as the company’s 2026 targets seem more plausible than before as order momentum has shown improvement. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news.
